title: Do you get matched with spuds in your promos?
body: I'm finding I domiante every single game up to my promos, getting decent team mates (well, the best silver can be). But every promo I get one or two players that can't even play their champs properly. Someone jokingly said you have to carry to prove you're worthy of a promotion but that is literally what it feels like. I shouldn't have to carry my entire team, just to win my promos, especially when some teams just don't want to be carried

replies.body: Actually yes, you have to carry.
